remarks: Closure of scalar sigma map i.e. the map from the vector space scalar base to the dual space scalar base.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hgmapcl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hgmapcl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapcl.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hgmapcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hgmapcl.g $e |- G = ( ( HGMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapcl.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hgmapcl.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. B ) $.
hgmapcl $p |- ( ph -> ( G ` F ) e. B ) $.
